summary: This document contains WHOIS information for various domain names associated with Epstein and related entities. It includes details about domain registration, administrative contacts, and technical contacts, primarily focusing on the domains nysgllc.com and nysgmail.com. The document is subject to a protective order, indicating sensitive information may be involved.

persons.name: J. Epstein & Co.
persons.context: J. Epstein & Co. is listed as the registrant for the domain nysgllc.com.

persons.name: Marc Lundberg
persons.context: Marc Lundberg is identified as the administrative contact for the domain nysgllc.com.

persons.name: David Lampert
persons.context: David Lampert is listed as the registrant for the domain ellmax.com.

persons.context: Steve Shackles is identified as the administrative contact for the domain nysgmail.com.

connections.description: Marc Lundberg serves as the administrative contact for J. Epstein & Co.
David Lampert is the registrant for the domain ellmax.com, associated with 116 E 65th LLC.
Steve Shackles is identified as the administrative contact for the domain nysgmail.com, associated with Dixie Systems.

keyFacts: The document contains WHOIS information for multiple domains associated with Epstein.
J. Epstein & Co. is registered as the owner of the domain nysgllc.com.
Marc Lundberg is the administrative contact for both nysgllc.com and nysgmail.com.
David Lampert is the registrant for the domain ellmax.com.
The document is subject to a protective order, indicating sensitive information may be involved.
